sources.title: Rudraveena ( 1988)
sources.description: Suryam, the son of a great musician wishes to change society through his music but the father does not like his ways and Suryam leaves home only to be felicitated by the Govt.of India for his efforts

metadata.Plot: In Yanam, Lalappa (Raghu Kunche) is carrying out illegal activities such as drug trade in cahoots with his younger brothers Muthappa and Kannappa. Notorious for his savagery, he doesn't think twice before murdering innocents and r...
metadata.Actors: Darbha Appaji Ambarisha, Elsa Ghosh, Raghu Kunche
